page.title: 16PRAM RACE
page.content:
This year Bishops Castle held the first Pram Race.It was a great success with over twenty entrants.There were about four people to a pram.One person was the "baby" sitting in the pram and the others pushed it from pub to pub around the town, seven in all.
They were all in fancy dress ranging from Vikings,who won a prize for their costumes, to Bunny Girls.
Each "baby" had to drink half a pint of something in each pub.
Everyone finished and the Rugby Club won in 10 minutes 11seconds. It was a great success and will probably be staged as an annual event.
